nodes.text: Ben Spax was a Human male serving the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. He had found the Rebellion on his own, and was an able fighter and pilot. After being screened by the Alliance's IntelTechs, he had requested a posting in Alliance Intelligence. Alongside Carns Capra, Denis Rygelli, and Trinna Orani, he was briefed by General Airen Cracken on the procedures for establishing a Rebel cell structure on an Imperial-held planet.
